coverPage.additionalInformation: BlackRock Japan Co., Ltd. is an institutional investment manager based in Japan and is subject to Section 13(f) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 and the rules promulgated thereunder. BlackRock Japan Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of BlackRock, Inc. The securities positions reported by BlackRock Japan Co., Ltd., are also being reported on behalf of BlackRock, Inc. However, BlackRock, Inc. does not exercise, and therefore disclaims, investment discretion with respect to any Section 13(f) securities positions over which BlackRock Japan Co., Ltd. exercises such discretion.
